description: Otoha Mao, a normal first-year high school student, has a sudden encounter with Hinata Meisa, and thereafter falls into the position of taking over as the top idol Hana in Aikatsu Planet. But at the same time, she needs to keep the fact that she's now Hana a secret! Aikatsu Planet is the story of Mao and her friends doing their idol activities and aiming to become top idols.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

node.description: __Hiromi Kikuta__ is a Japanese sound director, who works for the company Rakuonsha.

Date Kaaya is a Japanese idol and a member from Iginari Tohoku san. She belongs to Stardust Promotion.
